src_original: sa śramaṇaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu śramaṇavarṇarūpamādarśayati /  brāhmaṇaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu brāhmaṇavarṇarūpamādarśayati /  kṣatriya ... /  vaiśya ... /
śūdra ... /  gṛhapati ... /  cāturmahārājika ... /  trāyastriṃśa ... /  evaṃ yāma ... /  tuṣita ... /
śrāvakavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvakakāyavarṇarūpamādarśayati /  pratyekabuddhavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhakāyavarṇarūpamādarśayati /
